languages.text: "Кровь палача нашего народа течет по венам {mf|того|той}, что ты жаждешь сберечь. Чем заслужил{mf||а} мон-кай твое милосердие?" {n}Золотые искры медленно гаснут, и провидец устало прикрывает глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Тогда мон-кай лучше держаться от меня подальше!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кровь палача нашего народа течет по венам {mf|того|той}, что ты жаждешь сберечь. Чем заслужил{mf||а} мон-кай твое милосердие?" {n}Золотые искры медленно гаснут, и провидец устало прикрывает глаза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Then the mon-keigh had better stay away from me!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Then the mon-keigh had better stay away from me!"
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «La sangre de la ejecutora de nuestro pueblo recorre las venas de la persona a la que quieres salvar. ¿Qué ha hecho est{mf|e|a} mon-keigh para merecer tu misericordia?». {n}Las chispas doradas se extinguen y el vidente cierra los ojos, agotado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Entonces más vale que {mf|el|la} mon-keigh no se me acerque!».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「我らが同胞を殺戮した者の血が、お前が救いたがっている者の血管を流れているのだ。そのモン＝ケイは、お前の慈悲に値するようなことをしたのか？」{n}黄金の火花がゆっくりと消え失せ、先見司は疲れ果てて目を閉じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我らが同胞を殺戮した者の血が、お前が救いたがっている者の血管を流れているのだ。そのモン＝ケイは、お前の慈悲に値するようなことをしたのか？」{n}黄金の火花がゆっくりと消え失せ、先見司は疲れ果てて目を閉じる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “你渴望救下这个人，可他的血管中流淌着刽子手的鲜血。那些刽子手屠杀了我们的人民，这只猴子到底做了什么，值得你如此仁慈？”{n}先知目光中金色的火花慢慢熄灭，他疲惫地闭上了双眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，这只猴子最好离我远点。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Le sang du bourreau de notre peuple coule dans les veines de la créature que vous voudriez sauver. Qu'a fait {mf|ce|cette} mon-keigh pour mériter votre miséricorde ? » {n}Les étincelles dorées s'éteignent lentement, et le Grand Prophète ferme les yeux d'un air las.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, {mf|le|la} mon-keigh n'a pas intérêt à s'approcher de moi ! »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Das Blut des Henkers unseres Volkes fließt durch die Adern des Chem-Pan-Sey, den Ihr retten wollt. Womit hat dieser Chem-Pan-Sey Eure Gnade verdient?" {n}Die goldenen Funken verschwinden langsam, und der Runenprophet schließt erschöpft die Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}

languages.text: "Halkımızın celladının kanı, kurtarmak için can attığın mon-keigh'in damarlarında dolaşıyor. Merhametini hak edecek ne yaptı ki?" {n}Altından kıvılcımlar, yavaşça sönmeye başlıyor. Bitkin düşen Ötesezen, gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The blood of the executioner of our people flows through the veins of the one you long to save. What has the mon-keigh done to deserve your mercy?" {n}The golden sparks slowly die away, and the Farseer wearily closes his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Halkımızın celladının kanı, kurtarmak için can attığın mon-keigh'in damarlarında dolaşıyor. O senin merhametini hak edecek ne yaptı?" {n}Altından kıvılcımlar, yavaşça sönmeye başlıyor. Ötesezen, bitkin düşmüş bir hâlde gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
